About.OurMissionContent: Raha Al-Osra, with the help of professional consultants, seeks to discover easy, available and workable solutions to meet the requirements of our valued customers from the workforce and achieve the utmost satisfaction for them. Our goal is to continue as a reliable partner and customer satisfaction.
About.OurVisionContent: To be the first company in the field of manpower, and we aim largely to increase and support the growth of the manpower industry in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia in accordance with the vision of the Ministry of Labor and Social Development in organizing foreign labor and ensuring the rights of both parties (client - employment)
About.RateUsContent: Safety and security is the most important factor of the main factors that we focus on at ESAD, then quality as we realize that obtaining good services and maintaining high quality is your goal, our customers are our vital resource so we are always oriented towards achieving their satisfaction. Honest, effective, committed

Faqs.DisplayMoreQuesions: We offer the most frequently asked questions and answers that a citizen may need
Faqs.MessageUs: You can also contact us if there is no answer to your question
Faqs.FirstHeader: What nationalities are available to provide services to domestic workers?
Faqs.FirstContent:
We provide you with trained domestic workers at the highest level in performing the domestic tasks assigned to them. We provide domestic workers, drivers, and domestic escorts who are trained to care for the elderly, children and people of determination with different contracts and periods that meet your family needs, and nationalities Multiple Asian and African countries such as
 Indonesia, Bangladesh, Ghana, Nigeria and many more.
Faqs.SecondHeader: How is the visa issuance fee paid?
Faqs.SecondContent: Payment is made before the request is raised, through ATMs or through the electronic payment service
Faqs.ThirdHeader: What are the documents required to submit a visa application?
Faqs.ThirdContent:
Attach proof of financial ability, either through a bank certificate or 
 salary definition All documents attached must be in the name of the applicant
Faqs.ForthHeader: How long is the experience of a domestic worker?
Faqs.ForthContent: The two parties may agree to place the domestic service worker on probation for a period not exceeding (ninety) days, during which the employer may verify the professional competence of the domestic service worker and the integrity of his personal behavior.
